website_summaries.verdict: This unisex suit is perfect for buyers who want a high-performing pant with excellent fit.
pros: Available in a fun violet fuchsia or classic black
Waist drawstring tucks out of sight
Keeps users remarkably warm and comfortable
cons: A few customers claimed the pants were too short in length

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Which doesn't mean a thing unless the person supplies his or her measurements. So my waste is 36. inc hes.crouch to ankle is 27 inches and waist to ankle is 28. A large is perfect. PLEASE; When filing reviews..don't just say "great fit" unless you give measurements and the size you ordered...your comments are useless
customer_reviews.author: John Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Great price for fantastic dive pants
customer_reviews.text: Great price for fantastic dive pants! They fit like a glove and aren't bulky at the waist, very comfortable with a light drawstring that tucks away nicely (I removed the plastic drawstring stopper) . I am 5'7, 133 lbs, 39 hips and 28 waist. I bought the medium and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for cool weather paddling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for those paddling days when the water is frigid but the air is too warm for a full body wet suit. Took it out on my paddleboard in mid-50’s weather with mid-50’s water and didn’t feel any effects from the splash of the cold water on my legs. I ordered an XL because the L was too hard to pull on and, with the heat coming off my legs, I was worried they would become to restrictive and be too difficult to move, thus causing me to fall. I’m an average size woman, 5’7” and 150-155.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not a real set of wetsuit pants
customer_reviews.text: Follow up: the seller contacted me and offered me a $35 gift certificate to delete my review. So there you have it! These are horrible quality, even given the price. They are marked 90% neoprene, 10% nylon and feel more like straight-up nylon. No way they are 3mm thick. The fit was off - baggy around the knees, likely to accommodate the less-stretchy fabric - which would affect the cold water performance. I would not trust these in cold water at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Perlotto

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for a late October marathon, and was extremely glad that I wore them. It was in the upper 30’s with high winds and freezing rain, and while my upper torso was freezing...my legs were quite comfortable. They do run a little short in the leg, but I’m 5’ 7”, but I was wearing my ankle sleeves, so it wasn’t a big deal for me. Extremely happy with my purchase! A must have for any end of the year Mud Runs or Marathons.
customer_reviews.author: Smudge

customer_reviews.title: Women's Sizing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3" and 111 or 112 pounds and purchased a size small. Wow, VERY snug fit and almost needed a backdive to get on. Not sure if I should return for medium but concerned about "drag" when in the water. Rated sligtly lower on stars because of the sizing/fit uncertainty (size small maxes out at 115 pounds so I'm close to next size up). Great product for price and good return policy. Very fast delivery. I will purchase this label again but wish they would give better guidance on sizing/fit for us newbies.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Warm and well made
customer_reviews.text: These are built real well and are extremely warm. I bought them for kayaking and they really keep me warm on cold days. The complaints I have are the draw string around the waste does not stay tight and it seems that the top of the pants always want to creep below my waist. I’m forever pulling them up. For the price, I’ll put up with it. I would buy them again as my first pair, but would look for better ones if I wanted a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Holmer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear as outdoor pants in the wintertime in Iceland to keep me warm. They are working AND they look really good. My only complaint is that the legs could be a little longer. One star deduction for that. I’m 5’3” and about 115 pounds. I like the fit! Not too tight, not too loose. Very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Great!  I want another pair!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit, awesome product!! I'm using them with for kayaking and they work fantastic. Buy with TOTAL CONFIDENCE.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these in the 20's paddling. They are generally warm enough when I am sitting down but once out of my kayak I get chilly. Mostly happy with them. Fit is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Employee #427

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 36 x 29 (some pants a 38 x 30), I bought an XL and these fit perfectly! Go from my belly button to my ankles and move well!
customer_reviews.author: J. Couch

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well, and Surprisingly Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried at first about how it would fit, and I kinda had to trust the size chart to get the right size. It worked out great! They fit pretty nicely, and are snug to the point where it’s just comfy. Gonna have lots of fun when I go to Costa Rica this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Montero

customer_reviews.title: Did its job perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I went out in the early morning to go dig for clams. I am claustrophobic so cannt waer a wet suit. I ordered my pant and top separately so I can peel them off easily wo having a panic attack. It was a cold morning and I has on my pants w a wet top I purchased separately. It was a lil chilly but ince I got wet it started to warm me up and i was comfortable from 6am to 11am. I loved it! I'm 5'7 and weighs 155 lbs. I got a large and it fitted perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Meuy

customer_reviews.title: Good pants good price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XL. I'm 150lbs 5'3, I have a bigger butt. They fit perfect. I usually wear size 8/10 for reference. They aren't ridiculously snug, the waistband has a drawstring that doesn't cut into my sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for my specific need! I sometimes take photos of my boyfriend surfing so I stand in cold water for hours and these do the job of keeping me warmer. My only complaint is that it doesn’t come in a smaller size (XS specifically) typically with wetsuits you want a tight compressed fit to keep the water from coming in and these are a tad bit too loose for me but it gets the job done regardless
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Quality was good, but just too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought them but had to return them because they were too small. Quality was good, but just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Natole

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7” 15lbs, I just ordered an xl . The large is just low in the back and I feel like I’m always trying to pull them up to get proper coverage. I can still wear the large, that pair will be my backup. I am very happy with this product and have worn them several times.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 8", purchased size XL which fit just right. I wore them snorkeling in water 79 F. I am naturally cold so while those with me wore only their swimsuits, I found these pants perfect to keep me warm and protect my skin. I will wear these pants again as I also kayak and sail.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. Brunken

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PANTS
customer_reviews.text: I am a swim instructor, so I need something that is going to last me. So far these pants have done that for me! I just wish they were just a little bit longer but that’s okay I still like them I would repurchase these. I have had mine for about a month and they have faded , but that’s because I’ve used them every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C.

customer_reviews.title: These run normal size, not small like other brands
customer_reviews.text: Other wetsuit brands usually run small, so I bought a size bigger with these and it was too big. Would suggest buying the same size that you normally would for gym pants. Quality didn’t seem great, but not horrible either. They are affordable and will probably last a couple of years. Sent them back and reordered a size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Anyone USA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for working out in 70 degree pool water. The pants are very well made and fit very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Again, once we got the right size they were just right.
customer_reviews.author: c.allen

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic to swim in, light weight and durable. Fit comfortably but a little buckling near the crotch. 10/10 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Roan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking in cold temperatures
customer_reviews.text: These pants are absolutely amazing!! I use them not just for water, but also when I go on walks in 15-30 degree weather to keep myself warm. They are super easy to walk in and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great quality product. Sizing does run very small. I wear it during the summertime in NY for jetskiing and skimboarding
customer_reviews.author: Fentibow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and it dries fast
customer_reviews.text: It is very lightweight, warm and Flexible. Easy to get on and it dries fast. I love it
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and kept me warm
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'3" woman and the medium fit me perfectly. The pants 2 mm of Neoprene together with a shorty wet suit kept me warm and comfortable snorkeling in 70 degree F water. Really, really, really like these pants!
customer_reviews.author: MtrMaid

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It did a great job keeping me warm. And it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: kristina filbert

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Easy to put on - drawstring waist m and it continues to fit me despite 15 lb variations in my weigh.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but starts to fray easily
customer_reviews.text: Fairly comfortable but starts to fray along the seams easily after 2 days of use. I would think the seams would fray more easily if you snorkeled or dived with them as I only used them for fishing along the coast with 75% of my time side stepping.
customer_reviews.author: Chang Oh Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and off!!
customer_reviews.text: Soft fits like it was made for me it kept me warm and dry while on my jet ski and I got 3 mm for less than most companies charge for the .5mm thickness great product
customer_reviews.author: barbara richmond

customer_reviews.title: Hiking through freezing cold water
customer_reviews.text: It’s bought these solely for the purpose of going hiking in the narrows in Zion National Park. The entire hike is walking through a freezing cold river for 6 hours. These pants kept me pretty warm and no water got inside! Great pants for how inexpensive they are.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These swim tights were exactly what I was looking for to swim and kayak in this spring. The guy was accurate based on the size chart. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Maidens

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Seems to run small. Order 1 size up. Haven’t used them in water yet
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Realon neoprene pants
customer_reviews.text: fit is a little tighter than the Realon shorts but the product is made very well, if buying the pants buy one size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great for small boat sailing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad for dinghy sailing. They work great. Truly are unisex. Both my 62 y.o. dad and myself (29 y.o. female) can wear these and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water PANTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bout this so i dont have ta use shorts. It fits good.
customer_reviews.author: Fey Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these wetsuit pants! Fit excellent, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: The goods quality is very good and feel like your skin but just a little ...
customer_reviews.text: The goods quality is very good and feel like your skin but just a little bigger for me. i am 5.9 and 140 pound. i like this style. it will be perfect if there is top comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: xin.chen

customer_reviews.title: I tried mine out today on a Easter morning sup ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried mine out today on a Easter morning sup adventure.. I was almost to warm but not quite.. I felt really snug but being a woman I went to these men's brand to fit my shapely bun .. could not find women past size 12 ... I was really impressed with them and happy
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sherman

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this pants. It is so comfortable and not too tight or too loose. I am 174cm 60kg and size L works perfect on me. Cannot wait to try it out on the beach. I feel I can also run with this pants. Just love it
customer_reviews.author: Xi Li

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Used these to walk the Zion narrows at sub-55F water temperatures. Worked great. Comfortable and sufficiently warm.
customer_reviews.author: ivy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pant.
customer_reviews.text: Functional and great looking. I changed the tie at the waist to one that was a bit longer and easier to untie when wet. The actual pant is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit keep me warm in the ocean
customer_reviews.author: Noree P

customer_reviews.title: ... it was a bit short waisted but very very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Felt it was a bit short waisted but very very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: ... 12 so I ordered the XL and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I am a women’s size 12 so I ordered the XL and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Giacobbi

customer_reviews.title: Súper noche mas confortable
customer_reviews.text: Great panes love Them for sure i will buy more of this
customer_reviews.author: JULIANA ROJAS

customer_reviews.title: Very  good!
customer_reviews.text: I Like very much but I haven't try in the water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Chen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 and 170lbs, I got XL and they fit great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had time to try them in cold water yet. But they fit really nice and was delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the two piece and generally wears the bottoms while diving. They fit well and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew D.

product_meta.title: Realon Swim Tights Wetsuit Pants Women 3mm Neoprene and 2mm Men Youth Triathlon Outdoor Sport UV Suit Leggings Girls Boys Surfing Scuba Diving Snorkel
product_meta.description:
REALON is specializing in the production of diving apparel and accessories, We have our own design team and production equipment.We continue to provide the best surfing waterproof pants and customer service on Amazon.

The wetsuit pants size runs a little small, you can choose a larger size than normal. 

Features and Benefits:

>> 3mm High Quality Neoprene & Nylon Professional Eco-friendly XSPAN Fabric

>> Adjustable Waist

>> Durable Flatlock Stitching & Keep Body Warm

>> UPF 50+ Sun Protection

>> High Elasticity,Can Stretch 5-8 Times, Quick Dry, Not Aging

>> Super Stretchable Nylon Fabric Side Panel and Knee Panels

>> Classic Black Color

>> REALON Swim Pants Tight Fit Design Ensure Excellent Comfortable Body Fitting During Surfing.

>> Suit for Diving Swimming Surfing Snorkeling Canoe Scuba, Don't worry, it Will Protect You From Cold Water Effectively. 

Cleaning and Matainenc:

>> Firstly wash the diving suits, clean away the soil, sediment, salt which attached to the diving suits. 

>> Secondly soak in clean water for 2-3 hours, occasionally press and rub the surface which absorbing water, release the sea salt from the clothes. and much better wash by warm water, then natural hang dry in the shade.

>> Don't dry it in the sun,the material will deteriorate because of the high temperature.


Why Choose Us?

>> We have our own factory, and this rash guard is made by ourselves.

>> We take part in all procedures, material selection, dyeing, production and quality inspection.

>> We always try to do our best in all steps, do everything to satisfy our customers.

>> We have a professional operation team, we can serve your problem timely and efficiently.
feature_bullets: ★ WARMER Men PANTS: Thick super stretch foam neoprene and soft fabric inside help to keep you dry and warm in cold water.
★ ULTRA FLEXIBLE & DURABLE: The wet suit leggings with high elasticity, not aging.The diving pants are designed to maximize freedom of movement with excellent stretch and Recovery.
★ GREAT FIT: Soft fabric, perfect shape recovery, quick dry, breathable, adjustable waist and REALON unique super stretchy side panel provide neoprene suit better Body Fitting.
★ COMFORTABLE: Bomb-proof flatlock seams are smooth for comfort warmth and extra durable.
★ Wetsuit Warranty - 30 days unconditional refund, 24 hours service.A full refund is guaranteed if you aren’t satisfy with the product for any reason.
